name: Poison Sting
description: You strike out at a creature with a poisonous sting. Make a melee attack roll against a target, doing 1d4 + MOVE poison damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the creature is poisoned.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
optional: Instead of natural roll of 18 or higher, target makes a CON save against your MOVE DC, becoming poisoned on failure.
